questions.question: Is the wide, straight avenue leading directly toward the base of the Eiffel Tower preserved in the edited image?
questions.explanation: In Image B, there is a perfume bottle with the view of the avenue leading directly to the Eiffel Tower visible through its translucent surface. The bottle integrates the view of Image A, maintaining the appearance of the wide, straight avenue leading towards the tower, creating an artistic effect on the bottle's surface.
